channel.title: This discord has ghosts in it [one shot]
channel.description:
![5yvwgS|690x240](upload://qs4mYOo4zUvnTVN4NcBBSJeb2Ji.gif)
You can find the game here: https://willjobst.itch.io/ghosts
This session is scheduled for 3 hours. I will email everyone three days ahead to confirm attendance. Sessions will not be recorded, because of the unique nature of the game.
**NOTE: This game requires the use of discord.** There will be no video, only players who are "investigators" will be on voice chat, ghosts will only type. So expect a very different game style from what we're used to!
***this discord has ghosts in it*** is a game of entering and exploring a haunted house filled with ghosts. that haunted house is a discord.
in this game, players are either **investigators** or **ghosts** .
**investigators** can only speak
**ghosts** can only type
the discord is split up into rooms of a haunted house. **ghosts** haunt rooms and type their horror into them. **investigators** explore each room all while narrating the horror to all players. **ghosts** will reveal parts of themselves by creating new rooms, inspiring horror, and making the house a labyrinth.
**CONTENT WARNING** : Please expect horror, hauntings, discussion of death, possible grief and emotionally charged content may come up.
**Safety tools** : We will be using, lines and veils, the x-card, and an open table policy. This game follows [The Gauntlet's Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html).
**ONE SHOT**: [date=2020-05-01 time=09:00:00 timezone="Asia/Singapore"] https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M4y0L824gS0rZXpJNGW
